diameter.description: Set the diameter of the carving tool.
diameter.label: Cutting Diameter

angle.description: Set the point angle of the carving tool.
angle.label: Point Angle

shaft_diameter.description: Set the shank diameter of the carving tool.
shaft_diameter.label: Shank Diameter

jog_speed.label: Jog Speed
jog_speed.description: Set the speed at which the tool moves on the material when it is not carving.

work_speed.label: Work Speed
work_speed.description: Set the speed at which the tool moves on the material when it is carving.

plunge_speed.label: Plunge Speed
plunge_speed.description: Set the speed at which the tool is driven down into the material.

step_down.label: Stepdown
step_down.description: Set the distance along the Z axis per step that the tool is plunged into the material.

step_over.label: Stepover
step_over.description: Set the space between parallel toolpaths.
